Cal Poly San Luis Obispos News Source

Movie theaters museums places of worship gyms and fitness centers can open indoor services with limited capacityas of Tuesday Sept PERIOD  according to a county public health news release PERIOD

These businesses are able to open with modifications because the county moved from the purple tier which is the most restrictive tier to the red tier of Californias Blueprint for a Safer Economy PERIOD

Californias Blueprint for a Safer Economy assigns every county to a tier PERIOD There are four tiers based on the countys COVID19 test positivity rates and case rates PERIOD Ranked from highest risk to lowest risk the tiers are purple red orange and yellow PERIOD

While we celebrate this small success we must stay vigilant County Public Health Officer Dr PERIOD Penny Borenstein said in the news release PERIOD Our progress depends on each person in SLO County PERIOD We need everyone to do their part to slow the spread of COVID19 in our community. to stay in the red tier the county has to maintain the red tiers criteria for two consecutive weeks PERIOD The criteria includes having only four to seven daily new COVID19 cases per  people and a five to eight percent test positivity rate PERIOD

Without social distancing and wearing masks the county could potentially move back into the purple tier county spokesperson Michelle Shoresman said PERIOD

We are really teetering on that edge right now of being at or below the threshold to meet the red tier requirements Shoresman said PERIOD It wouldnt take much. to prevent the county from moving back to the purple tier Shoresman asked Cal Poly students to stay home and avoid large gatherings with people outside of their households PERIOD

Stephanie Zappelli contributedreporting to this story PERIOD
